Class OnlineEftposNotification

Represents a notification about a payment status change from the Online EFTPOS system.

TransactionId

Returns the Paymark transaction id included in the notification, representing the transaction the notification is for.

Declaration
public string TransactionId { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
Remarks

This value is included in transactions from February 2017 onwards, may not be included in earlier notifications and may return null or "" instead.
